channel.title: Comments on: So Dry
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: Next time you call me to come I will be very careful on the floor and take out those fake Halloween contacts I wear.
item.content:encoded: Next time you call me to come I will be very careful on the floor and take out those fake Halloween contacts I wear.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: and i am soooo totally gonna go bath and slab down the boys' eczema now! (neosporin, hydracortisone and aveeno)
item.content:encoded: and i am soooo totally gonna go bath and slab down the boys’ eczema now! (neosporin, hydracortisone and aveeno)

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: i would have recommended neosporin, hydracortisone and aveeno, but that probly would have had a similar effect. stil, whoa, and wtf!
item.content:encoded: i would have recommended neosporin, hydracortisone and aveeno, but that probly would have had a similar effect. stil, whoa, and wtf!
